Posts.EditableText:
I've started making a new puzzle game that takes place in a 9x9-room building.
Now it's only in pre-alpha, but I already have made 17 rooms and a few games!

You can try it here: [url:16t58vzd]http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/oustembdxuq-i_2whpsnlw/doors-pre-alpha-v0-2[/url:16t58vzd]
